    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.service  

    • Uses of Service in org.apache.hadoop.service

      Classes in org.apache.hadoop.service that implement Service 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractService
      This is the base implementation class for services.
      class  BreakableService
      This is a service that can be configured to break on any of the lifecycle events, so test the failure handling of other parts of the service infrastructure.
      class  CompositeService
      Composition of services.
      static class  TestCompositeService.AddSiblingService 
      static class  TestCompositeService.CompositeServiceAddingAChild 
      static class  TestCompositeService.CompositeServiceImpl
      This is a composite service that keeps a count of the number of lifecycle events called, and can be set to throw a TestCompositeService.ServiceTestRuntimeException during service start or stop
      static class  TestCompositeService.ServiceManager
      Composite service that makes the addService method public to all
